subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Yu Darvish struck out 14, Texas defeated Boston on Adrian Beltre’s two-out hit in the ninth inning. Both teams are 20-11, tied for the best in the majors.
snippet: After Yu Darvish struck out 14, Texas defeated Boston on Adrian Beltre’s two-out hit in the ninth inning. Both teams are 20-11, tied for the best in the majors.
